course_title: Seminar: 17th c./18th c. Art/Arch: Emblems and Alba amicorum
course_description: Advanced seminar on 17th and 18th century art and/or architecture with emphasis on critical texts, methods, and techniques of art historical investigation. For art history majors; open to others with permission from the instructor.
sections: Class Nbr: 3140, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: W. Melion, Status: Open
